name: sdcrs.report.submitted
content: Your stray dog report {reportNumber} has been submitted. Track at {trackingUrl}

name: sdcrs.report.verified
content: Your report {reportNumber} has been verified and assigned to Municipal Corporation.

name: sdcrs.report.captured
content: Good news! The dog in your report {reportNumber} has been captured. Payout of {amount} will be processed.

name: sdcrs.report.rejected
content: Your report {reportNumber} could not be verified. Reason: {rejectionReason}

name: sdcrs.report.unable_to_locate
content: MC Officer could not locate the dog in report {reportNumber}. No payout applicable.

name: sdcrs.report.assigned
content: You have been assigned report {reportNumber}. Location: {address}. Please visit within SLA.

name: sdcrs.payout.completed
content: Payout of {amount} {currency} for report {reportNumber} has been processed to your registered account.

name: sdcrs.report.auto_rejected
content: Your report {reportNumber} was automatically rejected. Reason: {rejectionReason}
